features: 💝【Relieves Hand Fatigue】- With the latest ergonomic design, the wireless mouse perfectly matches the position of each of your fingers. Mini-contoured shape drastically reduces muscle strain by 30%. This computer mouse has 6 BUTTONS. NEW ADDED SIDE BUTTONS -- forward and back buttons, help you browse the web conveniently.** USB RECEIVER IS STORED ON THE BACK OF THE WIRELESS MOUSE**

💝【Wireless Convenient & Freedom】 - This wireless mouse connects with the 2.4G wireless technology via a USB Nano receiver(stored on the back of the mouse,besides the battery).Transmission distance can up to 10m/33ft . Just plug and play,no drivers needed.

💝【Enjoy Your Efficient Life】 - Choose different DPI computer mouse for different needs-800/1200/1600/2000/2400(default 1200).For daily life - 800/1200 DPI is enough to meet your needs.For office ,1600/2000/2400 DPI can greatly enhance work efficiency by up to 130%.

💝【Longer Battery Life X 2】 - This wireless computer mouse is powered by a AA battery which can last 18 months battery life. The laptop mouse will automatically enter into the sleep mode after 8 minutes no any operation. Just click any button to active the USB mouse.**Battery life depends on different usage situation and the device )**

🎅【Durability & Compatibility& Lifetime After-sale Service】- ☑️Tested with over 5,000,000 keystrokes , the wireless mouse can keep lasting long life usage.☑️Widely compatible with laptop, PC, desktop, computer, Macbook, Chrombook, Notebook. With the system, window 7/8/10/XP/Vista/Linux/Mac.☑️18 months refund or replacement and lifetime LODVIE After-sale Service.If there exists any problem,please let LODVIE know.

reviews.reviewText: This mouse makes it so much easier to navigate on my laptop. I'm glad I got a wireless mouse.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 14, 2022
reviews.reviewText: I bought this mouse for a dell all-in-one desktop and it didn't work. Apparently, dell only likes dell so I'm using it with my laptop instead. The mouse is larger than I thought and I have small hands so it feels a little clunky. However, it would probably be fine for someone with larger hands. The color (blue) is very nice. It has a sleep function where you have to touch the button in the middle to wake it up. I'm not used to that but it's not a big deal. I had to use it with a mouse pad because it wasn't tracking properly but after a few weeks, it seems to be tracking smoothly without the pad. Overall, it's a decent mouse and the value for the money is worth keeping it.

reviews.reviewTitle: LODVIE Wireless Mouse for Laptop - Smooth and Ergonomic Navigation at Your Fingertips!
reviews.reviewText: The LODVIE Wireless Mouse for Laptop offers smooth and ergonomic navigation, making it a perfect companion for both work and leisure on your laptop. With its 2400 DPI sensitivity and 6 buttons, this wireless computer mouse delivers precision and convenience for a seamless user experience.Pros:1. Smooth Navigation: The LODVIE Wireless Mouse ensures smooth and responsive cursor movement, enhancing productivity and reducing frustration during tasks.2. Ergonomic Design: The mouse's ergonomic design fits comfortably in hand, allowing for prolonged use without discomfort or strain.3. Adjustable DPI: The 2400 DPI sensitivity provides flexibility in cursor speed, accommodating different preferences and usage scenarios.4. Wireless Convenience: The 2.4G wireless connection eliminates the hassle of cords, providing unrestricted movement and a clutter-free workspace.5. Responsive Buttons: The 6 buttons offer quick access to essential functions, increasing efficiency during daily tasks and gaming.Cons:1. None Noted: The LODVIE Wireless Mouse has met all expectations, and I have not encountered any drawbacks or issues during use.In conclusion, the LODVIE Wireless Mouse for Laptop is a standout performer, offering smooth and ergonomic navigation for laptop users. Its precise cursor movement, along with adjustable DPI sensitivity, ensures a tailored experience to suit individual preferences.The wireless connectivity and responsive buttons make it an excellent choice for both professional work and leisure activities, such as gaming.With its exceptional performance and no reported drawbacks, I confidently rate the LODVIE Wireless Mouse with a perfect five stars. It excels in delivering an optimal user experience, making it a highly recommended option for anyone seeking a reliable and comfortable wireless mouse for their laptop. Enjoy seamless navigation and enhanced productivity with this fantastic mouse by your side!

reviews.reviewText: I bought this to replace the one I’ve using for years. I hate clutter so I use this on my office desk without a mouse pad. It’s smooth and responsive. I use it everyday and the AA Battery lasts for ages. I bought a black one and it looks great next to my black cordless keyboard. It’s good value and it was delivered on time.
